input.job_description:
Suleman Da wood 
School of Business  
MBA  
Abdul Rehman Hasham  
Pakistan; Mobile: +92 3326654407; 22010059@lums.edu.pk . 
https://www.linke din.com/in/abdul -rehman -hasham -275b324b/
         
EDUCATION  
Lahore University of Management Sciences  (LUMS)      August 2020 – June 2022  
Master of Business Administration  (MBA ) 
Relevant Courses:  Operations, Sales , Marketing and Finance  
Harvard Business Publishing Education (Online Courses)      May 2020 – August 2020  
Relevant Courses:  Finance, Accounting, Communication, Spread sheet  Modeling  
Bahauddin Zakariya University, Multan        Oct 2011 – Oct 2015  
BSC Elec trical Power Engineering
EXPERIENCE  
Coca Cola (CCI)          July 2021 - September  2021  
Summer Intern  
 Critically analyze the past 404 days of operations by using Excel and Power BI and performed Breakdown analysis 
and identified bottlenecks in the operations which were causing delays of 32150 minutes and proposed a plan to 
improve operations by 21%.     
   
UNICOM CORPORATION  
Business Development Manager (B2B sales)      May 2019 – August 2020  
 Collaborated with cross -functional teams and improved the customer service experience by 12%.  
 Capitalized on previous relationships and closed new projects worth  32 million pkr.    
 Used business and technical expertise to demonstrate the usefulness and efficiency of product offerings.  
 Managed account relationships, contract negotiations, sales, pricing, billing and logistics.   
 Using data analysis tools and techniques to create charts and dashboards to track and report progress . 
 Lead planning, strategy, proposal process and bid preparation.  
 
TBEA CO., LTD           
Assistant Manager Commercial   February 2018  – May 2019   
 Executed  World Bank project by the arrangement of resources locally and internationally by coordinating with China 
head office and also made contracts and negotiated with Hitachi -ABB power grid, SERGI France & Megger UK 
(212k USD ) for the equipment proc urement and service delivery.  
 Nurtured relationship with the suppliers and negotiated b est prices for the organization.  
 Liaise with Finance department for the budgeting activities of new projects.  
 Participated in bidding activities of ADB , WB and KE  projects and negotiated contract terms.  
 
Assistant Manager Operations        November 2015 – February 2018  
 Forecasted the demand of products for multiple projects which are to be imported from the EU and China by 
coordinating with clients and vendors to ensure the sustainability of the inventory.  
 Managed the team of 25 persons independent ly to accomplish multiple  projects  within an allocated budget of 27 .5 
million by str ategic sourcing and vendor management . 
PROJECTS  
1- Digital Marketing – Launched digital product and performed Influencer and  social media  marketing to  increase awareness.   
2- Supply Chain Management  – Analyzed and recommende d improvements in Nestle supply chain  Strategy.  
ADDITIONAL SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE  
(1) IBM SPSS ( 2) Time management and Forecasting  (3) MS Excel (4) Effective communication and Negotiation  (5) Financial 
Management & Capital Budgeting (6) PowerBI (7) Tableau (8) Vendor Management (9) Adaptable learner  (10) MS Projects.
input.additional_info: At Acme Corp, we prioritize candidates from diverse educational backgrounds with proven experience in high-pressure sales environments. We welcome graduates from reputable institutions but hold no particular preference for any university. Relocation support is available on a case-by-case basis. Skills assessment will include a practical marketing project to gauge capability in real-world scenarios, complemented by personal interviews to evaluate cultural fit and growth potential.
minimum_requirements: Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce)
Demonstrated ability in team leadership and mentoring
5+ years of experience in sales and marketing roles
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field
